headline: Clorox (CLX): Assessing Undervaluation After a Sharp Year-to-Date Share Price Slide
summary: Clorox (CLX) has been grinding through a tough stretch, with the stock down sharply this year even as revenue and net income creep higher, inviting a closer look at whether the selloff has gone too far. See our latest analysis for Clorox. The pattern is pretty clear here. With the latest share price at $105.17 and a steep year-to-date share price return of around negative 35 percent, Clorox has been re-rated lower as investors reassess how much they are willing to pay for defensive earnings...
